tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an excellent experience with my dentist for a dental fillings job. The staff was friendly, and the dentist was highly skilled and attentive. The procedure was painless, and I appreciated the thorough explanation of the process. Overall, a top-notch dental experience that left me satisfied and relieved.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,Dental Fillings,Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr Simran and Dr Jasneet are a great team
They listen to the concerns of patients calmly and suggest suitable treatment options. They make sure that all the apprehensions are addressed 

Dr Simran did dental filings and single sitting rct in almost painless way, she comforted me during the procedure and made sure that the process goes on smoothly..  she had explained the procedure to me beforehand. she is kind hearted and a great listener, genuinely cares for her patients.. devotes time to get your queries resolved.. 

Dr Jasneet did tooth extraction very gently and ensured that it's as smooth and painless as possible.. he very well explained the procedure done and subsequent medicine schedule..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I Don't know where to start. Both the physicians make a perfect team. I was just in an awe how they explained everything so well and execution was even better. The most appreciated thing is their behavior their thinking the patient as their own family member. Subsiding their fears, talking to them, calming them. I am even surprised they do it all day with so many people but never get tired! Henceforth they ain't pretentious! They are that caring actually! Professionalism is amazing but what they feel ia something. Cause at this time we all know how people only mind their actions and are working for money! But this isn't that folks!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Supriya. Means a lot to us and our team. Really appreciate it.

review: Doc. Simran is just perfect.Her over friendly nature always kept me calm during treatments.I have the best experience with her as comapared to other places.Also one thing that i like the most about her is her goal is very clear to achieve perfection so till the time she is not satisfied with the work done she doesn't leave it like that rather gives her best efforts to treat it properly and perfectly.Also she makes me feel very confident every time i visit her and keeps on asking even during treatment whether i am ok or not☺️😘She is just fantastic.👍🏻🤩Don't have to think twice to visit her or discuss any issues with her.Its worth the money.....!❤️😘😍💕
